definition: a fissure in the crust of a planet or moon through which molten lava and gases erupt
details:
noun
- a fissure in the crust of a planet or moon through which molten lava and gases erupt
= example: a fissure in the crust of a planet or moon through which molten lava and gases erupt
- a mountain formed by volcanic material
= example: a mountain formed by volcanic material
